There's Syco, and pieces of Diskus, and quite a few others. A shuttle 
with bots on it crashed near there a while ago, so bodies would be 
scattered. Also, most of the forest is charred from all the 
pyromaniacs (namely Pyro) who fought for the Alliance.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Any idea who the bodies are?
> 
> Silver Scout found what appeared to be a carcass of a shuttle, 
someone had
> removed the important equipment and left a naked hull. smelling the 
air she
> detected rusted metal. she quickly followed and found a horrifying 
sight.
> The remains from the last battle fought. She was hesitant to 
search, fearing
> that Lady Hawk might be one of the bodies. The mutant knew what she 
had to
> do, she swiftly shot down the dune into the grave yard, searching 
the
> wreckage for any sign of what had happened here.
